description: Stakes are difficulty levels in Balatro. Each stake adds its modifier on top of all previous stakes, making the game progressively harder.

stakes.effect_en: Small Blind gives no reward money
Required score scales faster for each Ante
stakes.effect_zh: 每個底注所需分數增長更快

stakes.effect_en: 30% chance for Jokers in shops or booster packs to have an Eternal sticker (Cannot be sold or destroyed)
stakes.effect_zh: 商店或卡包中的小丑牌有 30% 機率帶有永恆貼紙（無法出售或銷毀）

stakes.effect_en: Required score scales even faster for each Ante
stakes.effect_zh: 每個底注所需分數增長更加快速

stakes.effect_en: 30% chance for Jokers in shops or booster packs to have a Perishable sticker (Debuffed after 5 Rounds)
stakes.effect_zh: 商店或卡包中的小丑牌有 30% 機率帶有易腐貼紙（5 回合後被削弱）

stakes.effect_en: 30% chance for Jokers in shops or booster packs to have a Rental sticker (Costs $3 per round, can be bought for $1)
stakes.effect_zh: 商店或卡包中的小丑牌有 30% 機率帶有租賃貼紙（每回合花費 $3，可以 $1 購買）

notes: Each stake adds its effect on top of all previous stakes
Must complete a stake with a specific deck to unlock the next stake for that deck
Challenge Decks can only be played on White Stake
Completing a run on a stake gives Jokers a stake sticker of that color
Stake progression is per-deck, not global
